column4: any network experts here? I'm having a hell of a time setting up my gateway
do you have any other machine working with this connection?
yeah I'm connected through the machine right now
right now I'm connected through a nat'd machine. the other machine wont connect
the two machines behind the gateway are ubuntu, the gateway itself is debian
so one machine works and the other doesnt?
can you ask a more specific question?
I can get out from both machines, I can get in to the nat'd machine through port forwarding, I can't get to the public machine from the oustide
you probably have to set up port forwarding to get into a machine from the internet for all machines
your dsl router has the only public ip address
the other machine has it's own IP, so it should have it's own ports
i own a block of 8 ips
my network's gateway is 65.101.241.134, my personal gateway is 65.101.241.129, the other public ip is 65.101.241.1332
